# cho-expansion-panel



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property    | Attribute   | Description                                                                   | Type      | Default |
| ----------- | ----------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ------- |
| `accordion` | `accordion` | If `true`, the expansion panel items will be closed when opening another one. | `boolean` | `false` |


## Slots

| Slot | Description                                                             |
| ---- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|      | The primary content of the expansion-panel. (i.e. expansion-panel-item) |
